command.name: moveTo
command.summary: Relocates the pen to the designated coordinates.

command.name: drawTo
command.summary: Renders a line to a target position from the current location.
command.param: Target x-coordinate for the line end.
Target y-coordinate for the line end.

command.name: clear
command.summary: Resets the drawing space, removing all drawings.

command.name: rectangle
command.summary: Renders a rectangle at the current pen location.

command.name: circle
command.summary: Creates a circle based on a given radius.

command.name: triangle
command.summary: Constructs a triangle using three sets of coordinates.

command.name: color
command.summary: Changes the pen's color to a specified option.

command.name: reset
command.summary: Repositions the pen back to the initial location.

command.name: fill
command.summary: Switches the filling mode for drawn shapes.
